NewsArticle.Title: Save Your Character
NewsArticle.Content: Dark Ages is sweeping out the databases. If you have a character on an expired account or if you have a character under a free trial account please take note: Any and all character names that are not on a registered account or free trial character names created prior to 2002/03/19 will be deleted. To save your old accounts the must be renewed. To save your free trial characters they must be registered. Renew today at http://www.darkages.com/webpages/account/main.html
